resources.string: Image represents the store logo or other store image.

This is an examplary store description which is expected to be multiline. Thus I we are using a very long string descrption to see how the overal behavour of the vard view will be with long descriptions.

This is an examplary discount description which is expected to be multiline. Thus I we are using a very long string descrption to see how the overal behavour of the vard view will be with long descriptions.
